database.name: VIEW ESCM_BANKGUARANTEE_V
database.view: SELECT escm_bankguarantee_detail.escm_bankguarantee_detail_id AS escm_bankguarantee_v_id, escm_bankguarantee_detail.ad_client_id, escm_bankguarantee_detail.ad_org_id, escm_bankguarantee_detail.isactive, escm_bankguarantee_detail.created, escm_bankguarantee_detail.createdby, escm_bankguarantee_detail.updated, escm_bankguarantee_detail.updatedby, escm_bankguarantee_detail.line, escm_bankguarantee_detail.escm_proposalmgmt_id, escm_bankguarantee_detail.internalno, escm_bankguarantee_detail.bankguaranteetype, escm_bankguarantee_detail.bankbgno, escm_bankguarantee_detail.bankname, escm_bankguarantee_detail.bgamount, escm_bankguarantee_detail.bgstartdateh, escm_bankguarantee_detail.bgstartdategre, escm_bankguarantee_detail.expirydateh, escm_bankguarantee_detail.expirydategre, escm_bankguarantee_detail.bgstatus, escm_bankguarantee_detail.bgduration, escm_bankguarantee_detail.escm_proposal_attr_id, escm_bankguarantee_detail.initialbg, escm_bankguarantee_detail.c_bpartner_id, escm_bankguarantee_detail.escm_bidmgmt_id, escm_bankguarantee_detail.financial_year, escm_bankguarantee_detail.document_type, escm_bankguarantee_detail.document_no, escm_bankguarantee_detail.document_amount, escm_bankguarantee_detail.c_currency_id, escm_bankguarantee_detail.verified, escm_bankguarantee_detail.notes, escm_bankguarantee_detail.bg_archive_ref, escm_bankguarantee_detail.exprire_in, escm_bankguarantee_detail.bg_category, escm_bankguarantee_detail.bank_percentage, escm_bankguarantee_detail.multi_banks, escm_bankguarantee_detail.foreign_bank, escm_bankguarantee_detail.foreign_bank_name, escm_bankguarantee_detail.contactname, escm_bankguarantee_detail.fax, escm_bankguarantee_detail.telephone, escm_bankguarantee_detail.email, escm_bankguarantee_detail.isbgworkbench, escm_bankguarantee_detail.bank_branch, escm_bankguarantee_detail.bank_address, escm_bankguarantee_detail.calculated_amt FROM escm_bankguarantee_detail
